briefdescription.para: Linearly interpolates the mesh data to the particle position from face-centered data on a terrain-fitted grid. The nth component of the data_arr array is nodal in the nth direction, and cell-centered in the others.

memberdef.argsstring: (const P &p, amrex::GpuArray< amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM > const &plo, amrex::GpuArray< amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM > const &dxi, const Array4< amrex::Real const > *data_arr, const amrex::Array4< amrex::Real const > &height_arr, amrex::ParticleReal *val, const IntVect *is_nodal, int start_comp, int ncomp, int num_arrays)
memberdef.name: linear_interpolate_to_particle_z

briefdescription.para: Linearly interpolates the mesh data to the particle position from mesh data. This general form can handle an arbitrary number of Array4s, each with different staggerings on a terrain-fitted grid.
